item.title: Entering GWD with options ...?
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

If my acc goes to GWD, he needs 40 kc to enter sara boss …
I already added graardor too, but to different height …

By clicking the boss cave u go to sara boss directly, but how can I do it like if i click on the cave, it asks me if i wanna go to Sara boss or Graardor?

I think this code is helpful a bit?

case 6440: // Saradomin Entrance if(SarakillCount >= 40) { SarakillCount -= 40; writegw(); teleportToX = 2828; teleportToY = 3758; heightLevel = 4; } else { sendMessage("You need at least 40 Saradomin kills before entering the chamber."); } break;
Plx…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2008, 12:58:35 pm[/size][hr]Must I add something like this to somewhere?

selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Saradomin Commander", "General Graardor",""); break;

How could I do it so if I click “Saradomin Commander” it teles me to

teleportToX = 2828; teleportToY = 3758; heightLevel = 4;

But if I click on General Graardor it teles me to

teleportToX = 2828; teleportToY = 3758; heightLevel = -4;

Read full topic
